column4: I'm still pondering if I want ubuntu or kubuntu when I install hoary... what I wonder is: Is kubuntu as good as regular Ubuntu? :o
Well I like both desktops... it's more that I feel Gnome has more support on Ubuntu - so it'll get more packages and stuff. :o
Oh well... I'll probably just try. ;)
I'm thinking of getting an AMD64 with 512 and it still seems low :o
Yeah, indeed.
Ubuntu needs like... 100 MB RAM and no swap on my laptop. :o
Gotta go. :o

w32codecs ARE the windows counterparts...
that's what mplayer is for, others don't officially support it ;)

Yeah the w32codecs are the real Windows codecs, but they don't work as well... I'm not blaming anyone, it's great that it works, and so well... but for some special video codecs it's just better in Windows. Because it's the only target platform. :\
You mean xine doesn't officially support w32codecs?
vcd isos not iirc :)
